description.value: Inquisitor can spend two Fate Points as a Free Action to grant another character within 10 metres a Fate Point. Any other character within 10 metres can spend two Fate Points to grant this character a Fate Point. In either case, number of Fate Points can't exceed Fate Point maximum.

system.benefit: Inquisitor can spend two Fate Points as a Free Action to grant another character within 10 metres a Fate Point. Any other character within 10 metres can spend two Fate Points to grant this character a Fate Point. In either case, number of Fate Points can't exceed Fate Point maximum.

specialAbilities.name: Share Fate
specialAbilities.description: Once per session, you may allow an ally to use one of your Fate Points as if it were their own.
